available_mods.name: Zombie Blanks
available_mods.desc: Adds some "Zombie Blanks" to the wall, which may be swapped out for already-discarded tiles.

available_mods.name: Different Number of Jokers/Flowers
available_mods.desc: Change the numbers of jokers and flowers. Note that this doesn't allow you to play by pre-1971 rules, where flowers are treated as jokers.

available_mods.name: PIE
available_mods.desc: Each player starts with a set amount of points. Players' point totals can't go negative. If a player runs out of points, they need not pay.

available_mods.name: No Charleston
available_mods.desc: Disables the initial Charleston pass.

available_mods.desc: Play with the NMJL 2013 Card.

available_mods.name: Press 2026 Card (beta)
available_mods.desc: Play with the Mahjong Press 2026 Card.

available_mods.name: TML 2026 Big Card (beta)
available_mods.desc: Play with The Mahjong Line's 2026 Big Card.

available_mods.name: ShariUniqueCreations Vegas Card (beta)
available_mods.desc: Play with the ShariUniqueCreations Vegas Card. May contain bugs.

available_mods.name: ILM Card
available_mods.desc: Play with the free ILoveMahj Card.

available_mods.name: ATF Card
available_mods.desc: Play with the free ATeacherFirst Card.

available_mods.name: MahjLife Card
available_mods.desc: Play with the free MahjLife Card.

available_mods.name: MahjForAll Evergreen Card (beta)
available_mods.desc: Play with the free MahjForAll Evergreen Card. Six hands are not yet implemented.

available_mods.name: AMJFE Card (beta)
available_mods.desc: Play with the free American Mah Jongg for Everyone Card. The 75-point hand is not yet implemented.

available_mods.name: Card-Free (beta)
available_mods.desc: Play with card-free rules: your hand must consist of two types of melds only, and these melds must match one of the following patterns: Any Like Numbers, NEWS, NS, EW, 369, 2468, 135, 357, 579, or Consecutive Run.

available_mods.name: Show Waits
available_mods.desc: Add some UI that shows waits.

available_mods.name: Show Nearest Hands
available_mods.desc: Add some UI that shows nearest hands.

available_mods.name: Open Hands
available_mods.desc: Everyone plays with tiles shown.

gets double score for a jokerless hand

charleston_left.display_name: Select three tiles to pass left

charleston_across.display_name: Select three tiles to pass across

charleston_right.display_name: Select three tiles to pass right

charleston_across_1.display_name: Select a tile to pass across

charleston_across_2.display_name: Select two tiles to pass across

charleston_across_3.display_name: Select three tiles to pass across

3_auto_no_call.desc: Skip all calls except Mah Jongg.

4_auto_no_joker_call.desc: Skip calls that only use your jokers.

5_auto_no_dead_call.desc: Skip calls that deaden your hand.

7_auto_discard_nonmatching.desc: Automatically discard your drawn tile if it doesn't match any of your hand tiles.
